com.xwiki.authentication.sts

Class STSTokenValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xwiki.authentication.sts.STSTokenValidator

  • public class STSTokenValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Validates STSToken Have main method validate to validate token and have some utility private methods helping to validation process
    Version:
    1.0

        getSamlTokenFromSamlResponse (String samlResponse) Function is getting samlResponse String - SAML - Object is object of Security Assertion Markup Languages type is an XML-based, open-standard data format for exchanging authentication and authorization data between parties And is returning SignableSAMLObject on success or throws exception on fault
        Parameters:
        samlResponse - - SAML Text Response (String)
        Returns:
        SignableSAMLObject (Security Assertion Markup Language)

        org.xml.sax.SAXException - - Encapsulate a general SAX error or warning, IOException,
        org.opensaml.xml.io.UnmarshallingException - - thrown whenever an IOException is thrown during the unmarshalling process of request/response from the wire.

      • getAudienceUri

        private static java.lang.String getAudienceUri(org.opensaml.saml1.core.Assertion samlAssertion)
        Function gets AudienceUri String from org.opensaml.saml1.core.Assertion samlAssertion
        Parameters:
        samlAssertion - - A Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) authorization assertion contains
        Returns:
        String AudienceUri - extracted from samlAssertion.getConditions().getAudienceRestrictionConditions().get(0) .getAudiences().get(0);

      • checkExpiration

        private boolean checkExpiration(org.joda.time.Instant notBefore,
                                org.joda.time.Instant notOnOrAfter)
        checkExpiration(Instant notBefore, Instant notOnOrAfter) Function checks that date now is after (notBefore parameter) and now is before notOnOrAfter (calculating Skew - which is new Duration(this.maxClockSkew) object )
        Parameters:
        notBefore - Instant now is after not Before (plus skew)
        notOnOrAfter - Instant now is before notOnOrAfter (minus skew)
        Returns:
        true - if check - is ok, or false if check is fault

                                     java.security.KeyException
        validateToken(SignableSAMLObject samlToken) Validates Token from SAMLlObject - returns boolen

        Returns:
